name: jquery-jsonrpcclient
description: JSON-RPC 2.0 Client for HTTP and WebSocket backend

scripts.test: rm -fr coverage && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --single-run --browsers PhantomJS test/unit.conf.js && ./node_modules/.bin/jscs jquery.jsonrpcclient.js && ./node_modules/.bin/jscs test/unit/tests.js && find coverage/ -name lcov.info -print0 | xargs -0 cat | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Textalk AB http://textalk.se/
